CREATE TABLE Financial_Statements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    statement_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    revenue DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    expenses DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    net_income DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Ratios (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ratio_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    numerator DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    denominator DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    ratio_value DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Performance_Indicators (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    indicator_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    actual_value DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    target_value DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Decision_Making (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    decision_description TEXT NOT NULL
);

### STATEMENT

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE financial_ratios (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  revenue DECIMAL,
  net_income DECIMAL,
  profit_margin DECIMAL
);


CREATE TABLE performance_indicators (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  expenses DECIMAL,
  assets DECIMAL,
  liabilities DECIMAL,
  return_on_assets DECIMAL
);


CREATE TABLE liquidity_ratios (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  current_ratio DECIMAL,
  quick_ratio DECIMAL
);


CREATE TABLE solvency_ratios (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  debt_ratio DECIMAL,
  equity_ratio DECIMAL
);


CREATE TABLE efficiency_ratios (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  inventory_turnover DECIMAL,
  receivables_turnover DECIMAL,
  asset_turnover DECIMAL
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE financial_ratios SET profit_margin = 0.25 WHERE name = 'Company A';
